name: The Factory (itch) (Rowdydow)
description:
"For what the leaders are, so too shall the men below them be."
-Xenophon

Deep psychology is at play in this twisted thriller designed to place the player in the hot seat of one of psychology's darkest experiments. It's a simple game, all you have to do... is exactly what you're told.

All mesh was created for this game this week, I baked the textures from a combination of color corrected commercial textures from poliigon.com as well as a texture I created specifically for the Efficiency Machine. I'm shooting for the "Use it or Lose it" prize with my single 4 channel TGA texture. 

The following Audio files came from Freesound.org

Ticking ClockA.wav
Electric shock.wav
ElectricityBuzz.wav
Long_Scream.wav
Scream 1.wav
static_stylophone_a.wav
die_1.wav

The following Music file came from WeLoveIndies

book-of-secrets.wav

All Monologue was recorded literally the day this thing is due.

I've met the requirements for the following modifiers:
Is this real life?
Army of One
Use it or Lose it
